mapper.insert: insert into kj_icbc( id, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, bc_status, gems_id, gems_fs_id, gems_code, query_type, c_name, c_tel, c_cardno, bank_id, loan_tpid, loan_level, c_name_mts, c_tel_mts, c_cardno_mts, kk_kpj, kk_loan_amount, kk_loan_amount_s, kk_loan_amount_total, kk_loan_ajms, kk_loan_ajqx, kk_loan_ajyh, kk_loan_rate, kk_car_stateid, kk_car_cityid , kk_loan_stateid, kk_loan_cityid , imgstep2_1 , imgstep2_2 , imgstep2_3, imgstep2_4, imgstep2_5 , imgstep2_6s, imgstep3_1 , imgstep3_2 , imgstep3_3 , imgstep3_4 , imgstep3_5 , imgstep3_6 , imgstep3_7 , imgstep2_8s , imgstep4_1 , imgstep4_2 , imgstep4_3 , imgstep4_4 , imgstep4_5 , imgstep4_6 , imgstep4_7, imgstep4_9 , imgstep4_10 , imgstep4_11 , imgstep5_1s , imgstep5_2s , imgstep5_3s , imgstep5_4v , imgstep6_1 , imgstep6_2 , imgstep6_3 , imgstep6_4, imgstep6_5s, c_sex , zx_result , dt_zxresult, dt_zxsub )values( id, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{bc_status}, #{gems_id}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{gems_code}, #{query_type}, #{c_name}, #{c_tel}, #{c_cardno}, #{bank_id}, #{loan_tpid}, #{loan_level}, #{c_name_mts}, #{c_tel_mts}, #{c_cardno_mts}, #{kk_kpj}, #{kk_loan_amount}, #{kk_loan_amount_s}, #{kk_loan_amount_total}, #{kk_loan_ajms}, #{kk_loan_ajqx}, #{kk_loan_ajyh}, #{kk_loan_rate}, #{kk_car_stateid}, #{kk_car_cityid} , #{kk_loan_stateid}, #{kk_loan_cityid} , #{imgstep2_1} , #{imgstep2_2} , #{imgstep2_3}, #{imgstep2_4}, #{imgstep2_5} , #{imgstep2_6s}, #{imgstep3_1} , #{imgstep3_2} , #{imgstep3_3} , #{imgstep3_4} , #{imgstep3_5} , #{imgstep3_6} , #{imgstep3_7} , #{imgstep2_8s} , #{imgstep4_1} , #{imgstep4_2} , #{imgstep4_3} , #{imgstep4_4} , #{imgstep4_5} , #{imgstep4_6} , #{imgstep4_7}, #{imgstep4_9} , #{imgstep4_10} , #{imgstep4_11} , #{imgstep5_1s} , #{imgstep5_2s} , #{imgstep5_3s}, #{imgstep5_4v} , #{imgstep6_1} , #{imgstep6_2} , #{imgstep6_3} , #{imgstep6_4}, #{imgstep6_5s}, #{c_sex} , #{zx_result} , #{dt_zxresult}, #{dt_zxsub} )
